name: Where Wind Becomes Quiet
storyline: The game tells the story of a seriously ill writer suffering from memory lapses. The disease takes away his last memories. Having found himself waking up in an unfamiliar place, the writer realizes that he can't remember anything. Trying to make sense, the main character stumbles upon bright flashes. It helps understand his connection to this place. Exploring an abandoned settlement, the writer doesn’t feel alone and some mystic power is tracking him and trying to fight him back.
summary: The story is about a writer who suffers from a memory lapse. Recognition is what he has been striving for all his life. But it happens that success becomes too heavy a burden.
